reviews.review: Underwhelming and predictable, particularly when we can’t help but assume that the next movie will undo all of the “tragic losses,” (a ia Superman flying around the Earth to reverse its axial spin ...).
By far the best MCU film yet, the cast was amazing! Thanos was the best villain I have ever seen!! Can't wait for the next film :)

5/5 I had very high expectations for this film and I must say it blew them away. It was an absolute spectacle to see all of these characters that we have come to love over the last 10 years finally come together. It was a 2 and a half hour movie that felt like it went by so fast because of how epic and exciting it was. Definitely a film to see multiple times in the theater.
Delivers on so many levels. Thank you Marvel! After The Last Jedi I really needed this one
Best Marvel movie ever. Expect the unexpected.
JUST AWESOME!!! LOVED IT. The action, the humor, drama, etc.. GO SEE IT❣❣❣
Avengers Infinity War is a hell of an experience. All the characters were great. Great action sequences and a great story.

Went and seen infinity war last night, just as I thought it would be a movie that had way too many characters in, and the plot was all over the place you had battles and two or three different places it was too much to try and comprehend, and when I tell you this you Believe me or not after every since Marvel movie they started this with Iron Man people always stayed in the theater to watch the post Credit scenes, I was in a small theater probably hell about 200 people I will bet it wasn't five seconds after the movie was over about 30 people just got up and walked out and there were some pissed off people at the end of that movie I mean we had a couple that turned around and was saying to us what the F just happen, you can believe the critic that are trying to tell you this is the best ending of any Marvel movie they must be smoking pot or taken some kind of drug that makes them hallucinate because the ending to me was bad, when you have people get up and walk out on something that's always been a staple of Marvel movies which is to stay and watch the post credit scene's and people walking out of the theater and were kind of dumbfounded and what they just seen one guy said I wouldn't give this movie a three now you can sit they and say I am just making this up well you would be wrong, I would say of the three avengers movies in my opinion this was the worst you can take my review/ Post however you want to but it's definitely movie I will go back and see him I've been disappointed in the last two Marvel movies I thought black panther was a good movie but it certainly was overhyped and didn't deserve the praise that it got. And no I'm not a DC fan boy so get that out of your head I'm just somebody who likes a good movie no matter who makes it

Avengers: Infinity War accumulates a decade of film making in artistic first footing of action, quick paced dialogues, and character dynamics to cherish in the furthest long run. All this at the weight of an excess of both characters present and runtime considered. In the end, it never drops. It's a practically compelling and jaw to the ground measure of movie time. But little does there seem to be of regret, it's really more of the quirky team up interaction, middle to large doses of fan service and a trunk pack of finale, rather than a lifetime culmination.

Avengers: Infinity War A+ First and foremost all hype leading up to this movie was well deserved and this movie fully delivers! Ten years in the making for a perfectly put together finale. This movie has every element action, comedy, adventure, and drama. You’ve already fell in love and been heavily invested in all the characters so character building wasn’t necessary the way everyone came together was fluid and not forced, the fight scenes made your heart pump harder and harder each time. This is one of the most realistic cinematic climaxes ever. This movie will leave your mouth wide open your mind twisted with your heart barely hanging on.Marvel wins with the ultimate finish. Of course there’s a post credit scene so stay seated.
